card.name: Evil Presents
card.ability: Put a creature card from your hand into play under target opponent's control. That creature attacks each turn if able... and always attacks its controller.
card.flavor: Tis better to give than to receive

card.name: Fruitcake Elemental
card.ability:
Fruitcake Elemental is indestructible.
At the end of your turn, Fruitcake Elemental deals 7 damage to you.
{3}: Target player gains control of Fruitcake Elemental.
card.flavor: Experiments intended to create the perfect holiday emissary resulted in a substance harder than darksteel and a fraction as merry.

card.name: Naughty/Nice
card.ability: Search another target player's library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle that player's library. // Search your library for a card and put it into another target player's hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Season's Beatings
card.ability: Family gathering - Each creature target player controls deals damage equal to its power to another random creature that player controls.
card.flavor: Arriving home, he suddenly longed for the blooksoaked battlefields behind him.

card.name: Snow Mercy
card.ability:
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a globe counter on it.
{T}, {Q}, {T}, {Q}, {T}: Tap all creatures with globe counters on them.
card.flavor: WARNING: Shake gently. Contents may cause choking, hypothermia, and/or planar invasion.

card.name: Yule Ooze
card.ability:
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy another nonland permanent chosen at random, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on Yule Ooze equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.
{R}{G}, Eat some food: Regenerate Yule Ooze.
card.flavor: It loves having family for dinner.
